extendedInfo.description: WHEREâS MY PERRY IS THE LATEST PUZZLER FROM THE MAKERS OF WHEREâS MY WATER AND DISNEY!Whereâs My Perry is a challenging physics-based puzzler where you need to use water in all its different forms - ice, steam and liquid - to solve the puzzle. Overflowing with intuitive controls, vibrant spy-themed graphics, and best of all, lasers, you will be immersed in the world of Agent P!MORE THAN 140 PUZZLES ACROSS 7 CHAPTERS, WITH FREE UPDATES! AGENT PâS STORYPerry from Phineas and Ferb is no ordinary platypus, heâs actually a semi-aquatic sleuth known as Agent P!  And, you know, he SAVES THE WORLD!  When summoned to headquarters by Major Monogram our fedora-rockin spy becomes stuck in his transportation tubes.  Help Agent P get to headquarters for mission briefing by guiding water or steam to the generators powering the tubes.DOOFENSHMIRTZ EVIL INCORPORATEDDr. Doofenshmirtz is set on taking over the tri-state area. He is tired of being defeated by Perry, and wants an agency of his own.  His plans always end in failure, but this time he has a seemingly infallible plan; to create an evil army.  Use his new minion-inatior to transform everyday, household objects into his own evil agents.  Try 5 evil agent levels for free and join the evil corporation officially with 60 levels for an additional in-app purchase.AMAZING STATES OF PLAYWater comes in many forms and youâre going to experience them all.  Cut dirt to guide water and steam across ice, dirt and rock in a variety of levels.  The fluid physics are lifelike, but way more FUN!CRAZY-INATORSThe evil villain Dr. Doofenshmirtz has scattered all kinds of lasers across the sewers â youâll need to use them all to help change water to its different forms.â¢       The âHeat-inatorâ instantly turns a body of water into steam, or ice into water!â¢       The âCool-inatorâ instantly turns a body of water into ice, and steam into water!â¢       The âCelebrate-inatorâ, vacuums up water or steam toâ¦wait, thatâs classified!COLLECTIBLES, CHALLENGES AND BONUS LEVELSCollect all 3 gnomes in each level to become a master spy and find top-secret collectibles to unlock bonus levels featuring Balloony â Dr. Doofâs childhood friend!Visit www.facebook.com/WheresMyWater for more top-secret hints, tips and other classified materials.Whereâs My Perry â every drop counts when itâs SPY TIME!Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.title: Amazing Game
reviews.comment: Fantastic game. Graphics are  amazing! Game play is as addictive as all other associated games.  Works brilliantly on my HTC One
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s not working on my phone
reviews.comment: Update please. The evil guy don\'t work no more. ..it\'s telling me to go on wi fi now.
reviews.author: Tron Jones

reviews.title: Package file invalid
reviews.comment: Paid for this app a while ago but every time I try to download recently it says package file invalid?? Can\'t even access previous versions!!
reviews.author: Talia McArthur

reviews.title: Update stinks
reviews.comment: Just paid for doof levels then update comes had to remove app to get update and now I can\'t get any of the doof levels to download. :p :p
reviews.author: Bj hampton

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Game is awesome the kids love it no lag works great
reviews.author: michael lacey

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: The game is great but why do we have to pay for new episodes after every update? Please add free levels.
reviews.author: Kar Fil

reviews.title: Was wkd
reviews.comment: Game goes off at mission four. Not happy after i paid for it. Plz fix asap im bored
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love this game, my daughter loves it and I enjoy playing it as well.
reviews.author: Eric Gomez

reviews.title: What the heck
reviews.comment: I paid for the extra levels, now Doof levels arent working, kicks back to main menu, using GS3, this is very frustrating can you fix it, or refund my money.
reviews.author: Tiffiny Bulliox

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: After the new update I lost all the doof levels. I payed for it and it won\'t let me play them. Please fix for galaxy 3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game not loading
reviews.comment: I bought this app 4 my son y.day it worked fine now this morning it loaded and let him play he went out to play another game and now it says loading but its just a blank page it wont load. When we pay for apps we expect them to work plz fix this.
reviews.author: jessica key

reviews.title: Force Quits
reviews.comment: Every time I try to play one of the Doof\'s levels, the app force quits. This also happens with Where\'s My Water, too. This app is a piece of crap and you should never install or pay for anything Disney makes!
reviews.author: Christopher Taylor

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Its awesome not only because I like Perry but because its it all of the other wheres my water games but with Perry
reviews.author: Ashley Nuckols

reviews.comment: Addictive!
reviews.author: Charmaine Ferraren

reviews.title: Game broken
reviews.comment: After the update the game wont load. It keeps saying not responding. Device is alcalel 960c. Please fix this.
reviews.author: Luke Dobson

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Ibwoukd have given 5 starts but I wish they didnt charge $2 for each level. It adds up. I think $1 is reasonalbe!
reviews.author: Yanal Mash

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: The game is great, almost the same as where\'s my water though. Need more level,  faster updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this game it\'s so awesome my mom even started playing on my tablet
reviews.author: Lizzie Irwin

reviews.title: Where are my levels?
reviews.comment: I too previously paid for th doof levels, but after the most recent update its only allowing me assess to the first four levels in the first episode before asking me to download (pay for) all the doof levels.
reviews.author: Jennifer Young

reviews.title: Addictive, like Swampy!
reviews.comment: My 4yr old son & I are enjoying this almost as much as Where\'s My Water (I say almost cuz we just started).
reviews.author: Carlene Symonds
